name: The Cult of Blood & Barley
description: The proud theologian Dr. Kidner, head of Theology in the University of Redston, has set his sights on proving the existence of a long-rumored cult hidden in the woods north of Redston. This cult is said to inhabit the long-abandoned village of Barleton, far from any road, seen on no maps. With little more than a flashlight and your wits, can you help Dr. Kidner make the discovery he craves?
